glossentry.glossdef: Localization is the process of adapting a product, service, advertising or any other content to a specific market. It should be considered different from translation because it actually goes way beyond. Localization requires you to convert text from one language to another, taking into consideration all the different factors such as: time zones, currencies, symbols, colours, legal requirements, website links, product beliefs and cultural references. The goal is to give your content the look and feel of having been created specifically for each target market youâ€™re aiming at.
